oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An autonomous robot for feeding outdoor pigs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Andersen, B.H.
Kristensen, E.K.
Jensen, H.F.
Persson, A.
Jørgensen, R.N.
Sørensen, C.G.
Jensen, K.
Pedersen, J.M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pigs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this is to develop a rational feeding technique for outdoor pigs and at the same time improve the outdoor system with regard to environmental impact and health. For a rational and competitive free ranch system ensuring high animal welfare and low environmental strain automation is crucial.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Andersen, B.H.; Kristensen, E.K.; Jensen, H.F.; Persson, A.; Jørgensen, R.N.; Sørensen, C.G.; Jensen, K. and Pedersen, J.M. (2007) An autonomous robot for feeding outdoor pigs. In: NJF Report, 3 (2), pp. 289-290.
